_source.text: 3) Takanori Gomi - Sure he got beat by Nick Diaz in his last fight (no shame in losing to Diaz), but I believe that The Fireball Kid will come back better than ever.

text: 3) **Takanori** **Gomi** - Sure he got beat by **Nick** **Diaz** in his last fight (no shame in losing to Diaz), but I believe that The Fireball Kid will come back **better** **than** ever.
